en_text: What does the girl see when the door to her memories are opened?
jp_text: ほの暗い記憶の扉が開いたとき 少女が見たものとは…
google_translated: When the girl was opened when the door of dark memory opened ...

en_text: Good night, little sorceress.
jp_text: おやすみ 小さな魔法使い
google_translated: Good night small magic use
